title: Tools
content: Trap Disarm Toolkit A collection of hooks, blades, shears, and everything else needed to deal with potentially deadly traps. This kit enables the owner to disarm traps/ based on. their Sleight of Hand skill. Shovel Tool Dirt-covered hands have left the grain in this shovel's wooden handle stained black. Use to dig up buried stuff, like the dog collar in Underdark. Disguise Kit A case containing makeup, prosthetics, and wigs - tools for concealing one's identity, or adopting someone else's. Enab
